column5: Upstairs private bedroom with queen bed; private bath; use of den. Second bedroom available if you need two rooms. Each room is $110 a night. Rent both for $175 a night. Home is located in very safe neighborhood; easy walk to Lake Grapevine. 8 minutes from downtown Grapevine; 10 minutes to DFW airport.
column8: Private bedroom(s) w/queen; private bath, den.
